events.text: My husband sees his brilliance in art, yet chooses not to nurture it! How!? Out of misaligned priority for the material sciences!? Such a mindlessly pragmatic mindset shall slowly bleed the world dry of its beauty.

Art is what humanity strives towards! Those mathematicians, engineers and scientists; all pursue their fields because art inspired them. A world deprived of artists in favour of the sciences neither deserves nor shall receive either.
